1009.name: Unknown
1009.message:
Miiverse functions are unavailable
on this system
1009.short_description: Your console has been permanently banned from Juxtaposition.
1009.long_description:
Your console has been permanently banned from Juxtaposition.

This typically occurs because of a violation of the Code of Conduct, or other offenses on the Network or the Discord server.
1009.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned.
1009.long_solution: Appeal the ban by requesting to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://invite.gg/pretendo).
